data.actual_result: There is a typing indicator and you can even type something into the textbar behind the user settings
data.expected_result: No typing indicator is visible on the bottom left where the textbar is
data.short_description: [Edge] When closing a popup (e.g. Change Log), there will be a typing indicator in the user settings (bottom left)
data.steps_to_repro: - log in to your Discord account via Edge 17 - Go to your user settings and click on "Changelog", "View Backup Codes" or other options that bring up popups - Close the popup (press x, esc or just clicking out of it) and observe
